meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bruce Kendall John Booher Dianne Bubb Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1006.

td.p: Bruce Kendall, a graduate student from San Francisco, California
John Booher, a retail manager originally from Baltimore, Maryland
Dianne Bubb, a personal assistant originally from London, England (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,800)

tr.td: AMERICAN HEROES & LEGENDS
TRAVEL & TOURISM
FRUITS & VEGETABLES
NEW TESTAMENT
NAME CHANGES
10-LETTER WORDS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Legend says that he dug Lake Michigan as a water hole for Babe, his Blue Ox')

tr.td: Legend says that he dug Lake Michigan as a water hole for Babe, his Blue Ox

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_2', 'clue_J_4_2_stuck', '(John: What is [*]?)
(Alex: No. Bruce or Dianne? We will accept that, in place of put asunder?)
(Offstage voice: Translations.)
(Alex: Hmm. You haven\'t been married long enough.)

put asunder (rend asunder accepted)

John
')
